name: TruthSuite
headline: AI Fact Checking for Lawyers
description:
TruthSuite provides a comprehensive platform to supercharge the due-diligence and research processes for lawyers and other professionals for whom the truth matters.  Lawyers use TruthSuite to uncover consistent versions of events as well as identify misinformation in testimonials.

Prev. Anarchy Labs
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:generative-ai; industry:machine-learning; industry:legal; industry:legaltech; location:new-york

founders.name: Matthew Mirman, Founder
founders.description: Before founding TruthSuite, Matt received his PhD in AI from ETH Zurich in 2022 where he scaled verified machine learning from working on 10 neuron toy nets in hours to 100m neuron nets in milliseconds and invented differentiable abstract interpretation and provable training.  Before this, he worked at apple on JS compiler optimizations that saved the world a billion dollars in time wasted waiting for pages to load, and before that got an MS from CMU on meta-programming CoC logic languages.

# Trusted By Lawyers at
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62434fa732124a0fb112aab4/62434fa732124a91e612aae8_quote-mark.svg)
A client lost her leg when a car plowed into a pedestrian zone. I normally would have spent days sifting through thousands of pages of community board hearings to find the evidence of The City's negligence. TruthSuite found the documents immediately and saved me days.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62434fa732124a0fb112aab4/62434fa732124a91e612aae8_quote-mark.svg)
MICHELE S. MIRMAN _Former PresidentNew York State Trial Lawyers Association_
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/671f5b57e716b4d44b69208c/673e2398594f74d025bccc81_Mirman-2.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/671f5b57e716b4d44b69208c/672a6e1cd86c6c46cbca999e_mirman-law.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62434fa732124a0fb112aab4/62434fa732124a91e612aae8_quote-mark.svg)
A client lost her leg when a car plowed into a pedestrian zone. I spent days sifting through thousands of pages of community board hearings to find the evidence of The City's negligence. I wish I'd had TruthSuite then to quickly collect those crucial documents and save valuable time in strengthening our case.
MICHELE S. MIRMAN _Former PresidentNew York State Trial Lawyers Association_

generated_description:
### TruthSuite: Reimagining Legal Research with AI

**Overview**  
TruthSuite is a cutting-edge company founded in 2022 that’s on a mission to revolutionize the legal research landscape through AI-driven fact-checking tailored specifically for lawyers. Based in New York and a proud member of Y Combinator's W23 batch, TruthSuite aims to provide attorneys with sophisticated tools that enhance their due diligence and research processes.

**Mission**  
At the core of TruthSuite's offering is the commitment to unveil the truth. Lawyers need to sift through mountains of information, and TruthSuite helps them do that—quickly and accurately—by identifying inconsistencies in testimonials and uncovering reliable narratives from complex datasets.

**What They Do**  
Think of TruthSuite as a superpower for paralegals. Their platform allows legal professionals to instantly create interactive chronologies from various case documents, including medical records, police reports, and court transcripts. This isn’t just about raw data; it’s about finding the gold nuggets—the crucial pieces that could swing a case—in mere minutes instead of days. Plus, it’s HIPAA certified, addressing all necessary legal compliance concerns.

**Team and Leadership**  
TruthSuite is a small but mighty team of four, dedicated to building a tool that truly meets the needs of legal professionals. Under the guidance of Group Partner Dalton Caldwell at Y Combinator, they're on a swift path to impact.

**Endorsements and User Feedback**  
The praise from users is resounding. Michele S. Mirman, former president of the New York State Trial Lawyers Association, reflects on their experience, highlighting how TruthSuite saved hours of painstaking research. Others in tech have echoed similar sentiments, calling it a "life-saver" for information retrieval and legal validation.

**Technology and Innovation**  
What sets TruthSuite apart is its reliance on advanced AI technologies like generative AI and machine learning to streamline complex legal content into digestible insights. The platform taps into capabilities that go beyond traditional research tools, positioning itself at the intersection of law and technology. 

**Backing and Future Outlook**  
With backing from notable venture capitalists and a growing list of satisfied legal professionals, TruthSuite is poised to disrupt the legal tech sector. The company is actively seeking users for beta testing, eager to refine their platform based on real-world experiences and feedback.

If helping lawyers win more cases and uncover the truth faster sounds like a worthy pursuit to you, join their waitlist for early access.

**Join the Revolution**  
Ready to see how TruthSuite can transform your legal work? [Join the waitlist here](https://truthsuite.com/<https:/forms.gle/BV8ZTQfdvnSoa39GA>) and stay updated on their developments. 

In a world rife with misinformation, TruthSuite is committed to serving as a beacon of clarity for legal professionals. Check them out [here](https://truthsuite.com).
